name: Ellie Gearheart

abilities.passive: Nearby allies gain increased healing received and calm state, reducing debuff duration by 30%.
abilities.active: Performs a musical burst that heals allies and briefly grants immunity to crowd control.
abilities.ultimate: Activates 'Solar Aria', fully restoring HP of allies within range and shielding them from damage for 5 seconds.

pathA.title: Harmony Conductor
pathA.bonus: +20% AoE Heal Effect, +15% Skill Cooldown Reduction

pathB.title: Steamsoul Architect
pathB.bonus: Allies gain temporary shield when healed, +10% DEF

lore: Ellie Gearheart von Aetherwing is more than just an inventor—she’s the heart of the Solar Ark, a steampunk airship that sails the skies between fractured realms. Her melodies soothe even the most tormented souls, while her machines pulse with hope and harmony. Those who hear her sing... often find the will to fight once more.
